main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Hondo, Texas on December 19, 1957, where one object appeared for 60 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as a ring-shaped and the size of a nickel held at arm's length., It moved slowly from right to left at a speed of about 1000 miles per hour., The object stopped sharply and then moved rapidly down the road., The sighting was observed visually and through radar., There was no unusual activity picked up by radar during the observation.
witness description: self-employed individual in Hondo, Texas, with 40 years of age.
